mapper.select: SELECT * FROM weekly WHERE studentNumber=#{studentNumber} ORDER BY date DESC
mapper.update: update weekly set weeklyId=#{weeklyId},learnProgress=#{learnProgress},dailyProgress=#{dailyProgress},hour=#{hour},timeShare=#{timeShare}, expression=#{expression},date=#{date} where id=#{id} and studentNumber=#{studentNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM weekly WHERE studentNumber=#{studentNumber} AND weeklyId=#{weeklyId}

SELECT a.studentNumber,b.studentName,a.weeklyId,a.date FROM (SELECT studentNumber,weeklyId,date FROM weekly ORDER BY date DESC) a,student b WHERE b.studentNumber=a.studentNumber GROUP BY a.studentNumber;
